channel.title: Summation on The Amateur Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Summation on The Amateur Data Scientist

item.title: Proofs of Trigonometric Summations
item.description: 1 Problems 1.1 The Cosine Summation 1.1.1 Product 1.1.2 Summation 1.1.3 Alternate Summation 1.2 The Sine Summation 2 Solutions and Proofs 2.1 Three-Step Proof of the Cosine Summation 2.1.1 Simple Substitution 2.1.2 Additions and Cancellations 2.1.3 Sum, Difference, and Rewrite 2.2 Prove, Rinse, Repeat 3 Reference 1 Problems 1.1 The Cosine Summation Problem 9, page 197 in Simmons (2016) 1.1.1 Product Use the product formula
